# Min Int8

> Minimum signed 8-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT8_MIN = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int8-min' );
```

#### INT8_MIN

Minimum signed 8-bit integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( INT8_MIN === -128 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
